verbs.description: [ARG0: sonic] [V: chooses] [ARG1: new president] [ARGM-LOC: there] a new president at sonic the oklahoma city company announced the promotion of its former chief financial officer claudia san pedro to the role of president following a january shareholder meeting a 12-year veteran of sonic corp san pedro will oversee the franchisee branch of the organization and report directly to sonic ceo cliff hudson san pedro says sonic was the opportunity of a lifetime in 2006 when she applied for an initial position as treasurer and vice president of investor relations she fell in love with the mission and culture of the company and wants to carry those traits on into her new role claudia san pedro sonic drive in
